name: Boiron
membership: Association of the European self-medication industry (associate member) - AESGP
goal: Boiron is the first manufacturer of homeopathic medicinal products in Europe. Its involvement at EU level aims at insuring that patients throughout Europe have access to the same high level of information on homeopathic medicines.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Enterprise, Environment, Internal Market, Public Health, Research and Technology
euInitiatives:
- Single Market Strategy

- Directive 2001/83 on medicinal products for human use

- Proposal for a regulation on veterinary medicinal products

- Antimicrobial Resistance

- Mercury regulation
